text: Crack Is Wack is a mural created in 1986 by American artist Keith Haring. The mural is located near the Harlem River Drive in East Harlem. The mural serves as a warning against the usage of crack cocaine, which was rampant in major cities in the 1980's. The mural has a red background with the words "Crack is wack" at the top in all caps. ==References== Category:Murals Category:Manhattan
title: Crack Is Wack
